item.title: Protect SaaS apps from OAuth threats with attack path, advanced hunting and more
item.description: Over the past two years, nation-state attacks using OAuth apps have surged. To combat this threat and to help customers focus on the most important exposure points, Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps introduces several new capabilities. OAuth applications are now integrated into the attack path experience within Exposure Management, providing an overview of the attack paths that a bad actor might take to access Microsoft 365 SaaS apps like Outlook and Teams. item.title: Discover and protect Service Accounts with Microsoft Defender for Identity
item.description: When people think about “identities” many default to the human variety – a user with a username and password.
